text: what makes Cisco unique is we are the
world's largest Food Service distributor
we're probably the only Global Food
Service distributor that's working
across many countries and many
continents we are a very high volume low
margin business so time is literally
money we can't afford to have issues and
challenges with technology we have got
to keep product moving our it
environment before he moved to the cloud
was probably similar to a lot of other
big companies we had a heavily
outsourced organization from an IT
perspective we also had a number of
Legacy applications that have been
running for years and years and years
from a technology standpoint our biggest
challenge has always been always on
always available our ability to scale
globally was very important and at the
end of the day I think the biggest thing
was our ability to innovate and find a
partner that was Innovative with us and
AWS was clearly the most Innovative our
corporate systems are probably 20 years
old the issues that we were facing was
it was on Old brittle technology and it
was falling over a lot causing real
business problems we have moved probably
uh 50% of our workloads out of our data
centers inws one of the most critical is
our uh rehosted Mainframe environment
that was a Mainframe emulator that was
running on our Windows servers and we
migrated that to uh AWS about a year ago
we chose AWS for our windows-based
workload because of its scalability
reliability we were in need to migrate
off of Server 2003 we chose AWS as the
platform to migrate from server 2003 to
Windows Server 2012 the AWS account team
and entire AWS partner Community was
instrumental in the success of that
migration they brought the right people
to the table they brought Architects
engineers and really made it a very
smooth transition in migration we have
taken applications in workloads that
have been unstable in the past and
hindered our ability to be always on
always available we've moved them to AWS
have gained incredible stability
incredible performance gains we now have
agile teams who can requisition their
own hardware and their own hosting um
without having to get handoffs with
infrastructure teams involved in it
which just helps our speed to Market
tremendously we now have applications
that are in modern Technologies where we
can begin to refactor them and modernize
them which we couldn't before as a chief
technology officer AWS does make your
job easier we're sort of out of the
hosting business and we're using our
energy and our time and our Focus Now to
create business applications that are
going to help us win with our customers
and win in the marketplace and that is a
great tradeoff
[Music]
